definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: But it took years for other physicians to recognize the potential of umbilical cord blood transplantation.
sentences.chinese: 但過了好些年，其他醫生才體認到臍帶血移植的潛力。

sentences.english: When PUPU was born he cut his own umbilical cord.
sentences.chinese: 噗噗出生的時候自己剪斷了臍帶。

sentences.english: Variable decelerations representing cord compression are frequently seen in postdates pregnancies.
sentences.chinese: 過期妊娠常因臍帶受壓出現變異減速。

sentences.english: Does umbilical cord circle a neck can be two weeks produced smoothly?
sentences.chinese: 臍帶繞頸兩週可以順利生產嗎？

sentences.english: What is dry cell of umbilical blood hematopoiesis?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是臍帶血造血幹細胞？

sentences.english: The body is birthed and then the cord unwrapped.
sentences.chinese: 身體娩出，然後臍帶解開。

sentences.english: For more on what to do if the cord is prolapsed, see page 565.
sentences.chinese: 如果想知道更多關於臍帶脫垂，請看565頁。

sentences.english: BB Doctor at birth did not take your baby's cord blood has not B search.
sentences.chinese: BB出生時醫生也沒取孩子的臍帶血查有否乙肝。

sentences.english: Cord blood contains embryonic stem cells .
sentences.chinese: 臍帶血含有胎兒的幹細胞。

sentences.english: I am also a week-long umbilical cord around the neck , but in the end living.
sentences.chinese: 我也是臍帶繞頸一週，但是到最後生的時候。

sentences.english: After the baby is born, some of the placental blood can be collected and used to save people's lives.
sentences.chinese: 孩子出生後，一些臍帶血可以保存下來救人一命。

sentences.english: Placenta in bag with cut navel cord jutting out.
sentences.chinese: 從胎盤袋子中拉出的剪斷的臍帶。

sentences.english: One umbilical cord can be turned into around 20 units of usable blood.
sentences.chinese: 一付臍帶可以生產出大約20個單位有用血液。

sentences.english: Stem cells can be found inside human embryos, umbilical cords and bone marrow, among other sources.
sentences.chinese: 幹細胞從人類胚胎，臍帶和骨髓等組織中提取。

sentences.english: Even a slightly different umbilical cord length changes your paw print.
sentences.chinese: 甚至是臍帶長度輕微的差別都可能改變你的掌印。

sentences.english: Methods 5 cases of vasa previa in velamentous insertion of umbilical cord were analyzed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法對5例臍帶帆狀附着前置血管進行回顧性分析。
